headline: Sherwin-Williams to Announce Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results on January 29, 2026
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) will issue a press release announcing its financial results for the fourth quarter and year ended December 31, 2025, prior to market open on Thursday, January 29, 2026. At that time, a copy of the press release and information regarding Sherwin-Williams' financial condition, reportable segment results and other information will be available by clicking on this link Sherwin-Williams Press Releases, then clicking on the reference to the January 29 release.
